ygData.subject: It's Autgust 20th, you should know what that means....
ygData.msgSnippet: (I m just using Uni here as the narrator, so don t worry, he s not a predominating character) ... He had already placed the Gateway on Earth and Cybertron. Now

(I'm just using Uni here as the narrator, so don't worry, he's not a predom=
inating character)

::Unicron::

    He had already placed the Gateway on E=
arth and Cybertron. Now it was time to activate it.
    Using what little e=
nergy he had he created the swirling nexus of time in the center. It would =
only react with another Gateway of the same design, meaning the one on pres=
ent Cybertron. The Gateway was huge, probably the largest mechanical thing =
on the planet, big enough to fit the Nemesis through. It was visible over m=
ost of all the terrain, anybody could see it.

PS: I don't mind if the diff=
erent factions send a scout through, they can either have it return, or sta=
y and fight against, or for, Magmatron.
